name: Chaos arcade! (for the mini jam 74!)
description:
this was made for the mini jam 74, with the limitation of these keys: A, X, B, 8, P, and space. A and X to move, B to jump,  space to place traps

for some reason the bad (wingdings) ending does not show up, this is an ending that would happen if you touch the enemy  in the last stage, or if you choose the wingding selection in the test room. in later updates i will add easier controls and more levels.
